handoff.one_sentence_goal: Build a single-page CognOS product landing page
handoff.problem_statement: Need an execution-ready Lovable implementation brief with explicit scope and acceptance criteria.
objective: Deliver an MVP implementation plan with no ambiguity
Define acceptance criteria that can be validated quickly
scope_out: Backend architecture changes unless explicitly requested
functional_requirements: Use goal as primary deliverable: Build a single-page CognOS product landing page
Incorporate context: Target: developers and CTOs
Enforce constraints: No backend; one page only; include GitHub CTA
acceptance_criteria: Output can be pasted directly into Lovable
handoff.lovable_build_prompt:
Build this exactly as specified.

Goal: Build a single-page CognOS product landing page
Context: Target: developers and CTOs
Constraints: No backend; one page only; include GitHub CTA

Do NOT implement anything outside the requested MVP scope.
Return changed files and validation results.
handoff.qa_test_prompt: Validate implementation against acceptance criteria.\nReport pass/fail per criterion and list any missing requirements.
